title: Toxicity - norms vs ranked
body:
I think nominated picks and 10 bans have really minimised pre game toxicity a lot. Played a few norms this morning and the game was clearly over before minions had spawned because of insane pre game toxicity. Norms always feels like a toxic bun fight.

What is your experience of toxicity in ranked vs norms?

replies.body: I only just started playing again, but I've experienced an extremely low amount of toxicity. IDK why.. people tell me it's there but I am yet to see it.
Ranked has higer levels of toxicity in my personal experience. I guess because people generally care more about ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BK4YqvHE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-01T07:50:27.385+0000)
>
> Ranked has higer levels of toxicity in my personal experience. I guess because people generally care more about ranked.

In game maybe.  But pre game?

Umm pre game lobby is pretty even for me to tbh. Player gets filled asks for role. Other player says no of course. First player flames and says if u feed fucking %%%% etc. Norms are basically just if seone steels a role in pre game lobby. I wouldn't say one in worse than the other in my experience.
Norms is toxic AF, and it's always the bronze kiddies.

*Ranked*:
> Player 1: How do you do, good sir?
> Player 2: I'm well, good sir, and how do you do?
> Player 1: I'm very good, thank you for asking, good sir.
> Player 3: Would you gentleman care to assist me and this good sir in the lower lane with a gank?
> Players 1 and 2: It would be a pleasure, our good sirs!

*Normals*:
> Me: Hi.
> \*Silence\*
> Me: Anyone there?
> \*More silence\*
> Me: \*Dies once, under tower, from a 5 man gank\*
> Random ally [all]: Report [me] for feeding.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BK4YqvHE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-01T12:51:38.289+0000)
>
> *Ranked*:
> 
> *Normals*:

For me it is

Ranked p1: hi guys i got autofilled,  may i please mid
Ranked p2: sorry mate
Ranked p1: np


Norms p1: jg
Norms p2: no i called 
P1: jg or feed
P2: fuck you i called
P1: dont care. Sb cn fuck you mother
P2: feeding
P3: omg double jg? Gg.
